text: Motion
Motion
Motion

Thank you for your hard work ♡
I look forward to working with you again ♡

──── Good job, Fuyuko.
All the staff were praising you.

Of course they were.
Who do you think Fuyu is?

Because I'm an idol, I always have to be someone
lovable, no matter what.

Haha... As expected, you're thorough.
I'll work hard as a producer so that Fuyuko can shine.

─I have something to discuss.
Remember we talked about forming a unit before?

I'm thinking of a three-person unit, but first, I found
a perfect member, so I'll introduce them soon.
... A perfect fit, huh...

Nice to meet you, Asahi Serizawa!
Looking forward to working with you~!

...Uh, Asahi-chan, right...?
Thanks for the introduction.

The pleasure is mine♡
I'd be happy if we could get along well.
Of course, Fuyuko-chan!

...Sorry, if it's okay with you... instead of calling me Fuyuko,
could you call me Fuyu...
What kind of idol is Fuyuko-chan?

─Eh? F-Fuyu is...
I just... want to become a cute idol...

Oh, really...?
A cute idol, huh...

Fuyuko-chan, aiming for something interesting!
I've never thought about that!

What do you mean!?
You said you found the perfect girl, right!?

At first, it's surprising, but...
Asahi will surely be a good stimulus for Fuyuko...

Thanks to her, I'm getting plenty of stimulus!
Especially in the nerve center that handles irritation! Idiot!
